name: Fairy Fencer F: Advent Dark Force Complete Deluxe Set
name_original: Fairy Fencer F: Advent Dark Force Complete Deluxe Set
description:
Get it all with the Complete Deluxe Set! Includes the game, plus all the content of both the Deluxe Pack and the DLC Pack.

DLC Contents:
  • Veteran Fencer Armor & Accessory Sets
  • Ultimate Fencer Armor & Accessory Sets
  • Fairy Set 1: Ahab & Leela
  • Fairy Set 2: Aques & Drulger
  • Fairy Set 3: Lars & Foxer

Deluxe Edition Contents:
  • Character Collection Art Book
  • Concept Art Collection Art Book
  • 6 Mobile Wallpapers
  • 5 PC Wallpapers
